name: Domination
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your competitors have overwhelmed you and seized the wealth of Io. But don't fret. There are other moons and planets out there, ready to be mined and developed. You may yet strike it rich!

name: Time

name: Diplomatic

Build the Co-Op Network and be voted
world leader to win!
